name: surface_fdr
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Tool to calculate surface FDR correction for vertex analysis.

inputs.description: Input VTK file from vertex analysis
inputs.name: Input VTK file

output-files.description: Output VTK file with corrected p-values
output-files.name: Corrected p-values VTK

output-files.description: Output VTK file with FDR thresholded values
output-files.name: FDR thresholded values VTK
